meanings.definition: A type of fabric with a soft, smooth pile
meanings.sent1: The store displayed various velvets in rich colors.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress made of velvets to the elegant party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to nap on the velvets, leaving a trail of fur behind.
meanings.sent4: The velvets of the night sky shimmered with countless stars.
meanings.sent5: Running your hand over the velvets feels like touching a cloud.
